lead_paragraph: Tessco Technologies, which makes products used to build wireless systems, said Thursday that its board unanimously rejected a buyout proposal from the Discovery Group, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: Tessco Technologies, which makes products used to build wireless systems, said Thursday that its board unanimously rejected a buyout proposal from the Discovery Group.
abstract: Tessco Technologies, which makes products used to build wireless systems, said Thursday that its board unanimously rejected a buyout proposal from the Discovery Group.
